ctx: intros net Hce Hvc Hcc p h e Hin.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface net : network Hce : CandidateEntries net Hvc : votes_correct net Hcc : cronies_correct net p : packet h : Net.name e : entry Hin : In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) HinP : In p (nwPackets {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |}) Hbody : pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true Hterm : currentTerm (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)) = eTerm e HwonE : wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)))) = true Unable to unify "CandidateEntries net" with "type (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)) <> Candidate".

original: intros net Hce Hvc Hcc p h e Hin. unfold CandidateEntriesLowered, deghost in *. intros HinP Hbody Hterm HwonE. apply (handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries net h h pBody h' t r st' e); auto. apply Hce.
